lps.title: Lux Network Architecture & Community Framework
lps.description: Defines the overall architecture of the Lux multi-chain network and the governance/process framework for the community.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Primary Chain, Native Tokens, and Tokenomics
Lux Virtual Machine and Execution Environment
lps.description: Specifies the Lux execution model, which is designed to be EVM-compatible while allowing future extensibility for new virtual machines.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Lux Subnet Architecture and Cross-Chain Interoperability
lps.description: Introduces Lux’s subnet architecture, wherein the network consists of multiple parallel blockchains (“subnets”) that can each host specialized applications, yet remain interconnected through a common platform.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Quantum-Resistant Cryptography Integration in Lux
lps.description: Proposes integrating quantum-resistant cryptographic primitives into the Lux protocol to future-proof the network against quantum computer attacks.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Lux Quantum-Safe Wallets and Multisig Standard
lps.description: Focuses on the design of Lux’s quantum-safe wallet infrastructure, including a new multisignature (multisig) standard that remains secure against quantum adversaries.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Network Runner & Testing Framework
lps.description: Specifies the Lux Network Runner and testing frameworks.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: VM SDK Specification
lps.description: Defines the Virtual Machine SDK for Lux.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Plugin Architecture
lps.description: Describes a Plugin Architecture for Lux nodes.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: CLI Tool Specification
lps.description: Defines the official Command-Line Interface (CLI) tools for Lux.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: P-Chain (Platform Chain) Specification [DEPRECATED]
lps.description: Specifies the Platform Chain, which is the metadata and coordination chain of Lux.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: X-Chain (Exchange Chain) Specification
lps.description: High-performance order book DEX with Lamport OTS quantum safety
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: C-Chain (Contract Chain) Specification
lps.description: Defines the Contract Chain, which is Lux’s EVM-compatible smart contract chain.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: M-Chain – Decentralised MPC Custody & Swap-Signature Layer
lps.description: Purpose-built subnet providing threshold-signature custody, on-chain swap-signature proofs, slashing and reward logic, and light-client proofs for bridge operations.
lps.author: Lux Protocol Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: M-Chain Threshold Signatures with CGG21 (UC Non-Interactive ECDSA)
lps.description: Formal design for integrating the CGG21 threshold ECDSA protocol in Lux's M-Chain (expanding on LP-13).
lps.author: Lux Industries Inc.

lps.title: MPC Bridge Protocol
lps.description: Defines the overall Lux Bridge protocol using Multi-Party Computation/Threshold Signatures.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Teleport Cross-Chain Protocol
lps.description: Defines the Teleport protocol for cross-chain transfers within Lux's network.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Bridge Asset Registry
lps.description: Specifies a standard registry for bridged assets.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Cross-Chain Message Format
lps.description: Standardizes the message format for cross-chain communications.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Bridge Security Framework
lps.description: Comprehensive security framework for cross-chain bridge operations.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: LRC-20 Fungible Token Standard
lps.description: This LP retains the Lux Request for Comment 20 standard.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Lux Teleport Protocol
lps.description: A framework for native, trust-minimized cross-chain asset transfers using MPC-powered burn-and-mint or lock-and-release mechanisms.
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: Warp Messaging 2.0: Native Interchain Transfers
lps.description: A high-speed, low-cost communication protocol for chains within the Lux ecosystem that share a common validator set with the Primary Network.
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: NFT Staking and Native Interchain Transfer
lps.description: A standard for enabling NFTs to be staked for yield and transferred natively between the X-Chain, C-Chain, and other supported chains via the Teleport Protocol.
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: Parallel Validation and Shared Mempool
lps.description: An enhancement to the Lux node software to allow a single validator to concurrently validate multiple Lux-family chains and participate in a shared mempool.
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: L2 to Sovereign L1 Ascension and Fee Model
lps.description: Defines the process and fee structure for a Lux L2 to become a sovereign L1, and the ongoing fee model for L1 validators.
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: C-Chain EVM Equivalence and Core EIPs Adoption
lps.description: Formalizes the policy of maintaining C-Chain EVM equivalence with Ethereum and Avalanche by adopting their major network upgrades and their constituent EIPs/ACPs.
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: LRC Token Standards Adoption
lps.description: Adopts and rebrands key Ethereum Request for Comment (ERC) token standards as Lux Request for Comment (LRC) standards for the Lux ecosystem.
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: LRC-20 Burnable Token Extension
lps.description: Optional extension of the fungible token standard to allow token holders to irreversibly destroy tokens
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: LRC-20 Mintable Token Extension
lps.description: Optional extension of the fungible token standard to allow authorized accounts to create new tokens
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: LRC-20 Bridgable Token Extension
lps.description: Optional extension of the fungible token standard to support native bridging operations via burn and mint
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: LRC-721 Burnable Token Extension
lps.description: Optional extension of the non-fungible token standard to allow holders to destroy their tokens
lps.author: Gemini (@gemini)

lps.title: C-Chain Rollup Plugin Architecture
lps.description: A plugin-based architecture for integrating Optimism and other rollup stacks into the Lux C-Chain (geth) client
lps.author: Lux Network Team

lps.title: P-Chain State Rollup to C-Chain EVM
lps.description: A standardized framework for rolling up P-Chain state commitments into the C-Chain for on-chain verification and cross-chain applications
lps.author: Lux Network Team

lps.title: P-Chain as Superchain L2 – OP Stack Rollup Integration
lps.description: Blueprint for integrating the P-Chain as an OP Stack rollup into the Ethereum Superchain while preserving Lux Consensus
lps.author: Zach Kelling (@zeekay) and Lux Team (@luxfi)

lps.title: Stage-Sync Pipeline for Coreth Bootstrapping
lps.description: Study and prototype a staged sync architecture, inspired by Erigon, to accelerate and optimize the C-Chain initial sync in Lux’s geth fork
lps.author: Zach Kelling (@zeekay) and Lux Team (@luxfi)

lps.title: X-Chain Order-Book DEX API & RPC Addendum
lps.description: Detailed specification of transaction types, wire formats, RPC endpoints, indexer schema, and CLI enhancements for the X-Chain Order-Book DEX extension (LP-006)
lps.author: Zach Kelling (@zeekay) and Lux Team (@luxfi)

lps.title: Native Swap Integration on M-Chain, X-Chain, and Z-Chain
lps.description: Deep-integration blueprint to migrate legacy swaps REST API (swaps.ts) into fully on-chain M/X/Z chain transactions and RPC
lps.author: Lux Network Team

lps.title: LX Python SDK Corollary for On-Chain Actions
lps.description: Breakdown of Python client (lx.api.Exchange) methods and mapping to on-chain Dex actions
lps.author: Lux Network Team

lps.title: Wallet Standards
lps.description: Wallet-related standards.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Multi-Signature Wallet Standard
lps.description: Defines the standard for multi-signature wallets on Lux Network with quantum-safe options
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Z-Chain Encrypted Execution Layer Interface
lps.description: Interface specification for Z-Chain’s encrypted execution layer, including EVM precompiles, JSON-RPC extensions, and TEE design.
lps.author: Zach Kelling (@zeekay) and Lux Team (@luxfi)

lps.title: Developer Tools Overview
lps.description: Index of standards and protocols that support developer workflows and tooling in the Lux ecosystem.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: DeFi Protocols Overview
lps.description: Index of decentralized finance protocols, standards, and building blocks in the Lux ecosystem.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Automated Market Maker (AMM) Standard
lps.description: Standard for implementing automated market makers on Lux Network based on Uniswap V2/V3
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Yield Farming Protocol Standard
lps.description: Standard for implementing yield farming and liquidity mining protocols on Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: NFT Marketplace Protocol Standard
lps.description: Standard for implementing NFT marketplaces on Lux Network based on Zora protocol
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Tokenized Vault Standard (LRC-4626)
lps.description: A standard for tokenized vaults on Lux Network based on ERC-4626
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Multi-Token Standard (LRC-6909)
lps.description: Minimal multi-token standard for Lux Network based on ERC-6909
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Oracle Integration Standard via Z-Chain
lps.description: Defines the standard for oracle services leveraging Z-Chain's shared root and light client infrastructure
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Asynchronous Vault Standard (LRC-7540)
lps.description: Extension of LRC-4626 for asynchronous deposit and redemption flows based on ERC-7540
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Bonding Curve AMM Standard
lps.description: Standard for implementing bonding curve-based AMMs on Lux Network inspired by Sudoswap
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Drop Distribution Standard
lps.description: Standard for token distribution mechanisms including airdrops and claimable distributions
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: NFT Staking Standard
lps.description: Standard for staking NFTs to earn rewards on Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Media Content NFT Standard
lps.description: Standard for media and content NFTs with licensing, royalties, and metadata on Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Bridged Asset Standard
lps.description: Standard for bridged tokens from external chains to Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Batch Execution Standard (Multicall)
lps.description: Standard for executing multiple contract calls in a single transaction on Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: CREATE2 Factory Standard
lps.description: Defines a standard interface for deterministic contract deployment factories using CREATE2
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: TEE Integration Standard
lps.description: Defines standard interfaces for Trusted Execution Environment integration on Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Random Number Generation Standard
lps.description: Defines standard interfaces for secure random number generation on Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: A-Chain (Attestation Chain) Specification
lps.description: Defines the A-Chain for network-wide trusted execution verification and two-token economics
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: B-Chain (Bridge Chain) Specification
lps.description: Defines the B-Chain as Lux Network's dedicated bridge chain with MPC custody and quantum-safe extensions
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Security Audit Framework
lps.description: Defines the security audit standards and requirements for Lux Network protocols
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Research Papers Index
lps.description: Index of research papers, experimental proposals, and forward-looking explorations for the Lux ecosystem.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Payment Processing Research
lps.description: Research on payment processing systems and credit card integration for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Cross-Chain Messaging Research
lps.description: Research on cross-chain messaging protocols and implementations for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Decentralized Identity Research
lps.description: Research on decentralized identity solutions and privacy-preserving KYC for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Governance Framework Research
lps.description: Research on decentralized governance models and implementation strategies for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Stablecoin Mechanisms Research
lps.description: Research on stablecoin designs and stability mechanisms for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: MEV Protection Research
lps.description: Research on Maximum Extractable Value (MEV) mitigation strategies for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Data Availability Research
lps.description: Research on data availability solutions and storage optimization for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Luxfi GraphDB & GraphQL Engine Integration
lps.description: Unify chain data with an embedded GraphDB and GraphQL engine, using a Go-based Badger-Plus backend, a custom GraphVM for on-chain querying, and new precompiles for graph mutations and proofs.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxnet), Luxfi Contributors

lps.title: Q-Chain – Quantum-Secure Consensus Protocol Family (Quasar)
lps.description: Comprehensive specification of the Quasar quantum-secure consensus protocol family for Lux Network, featuring dual-certificate finality
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: NIST Post-Quantum Cryptography Integration for Lux Network
lps.author: Lux Network Team

lps.title: Solidity GraphQL Extension for Native G-Chain Integration
lps.description: Extends Solidity with embedded GraphQL syntax for seamless cross-chain queries from C-Chain smart contracts
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: Immutable Training Ledger for Privacy-Preserving AI
lps.author: Lux Network Team

lps.title: MPC-LSS - Multi-Party Computation Linear Secret Sharing with Dynamic Resharing
lps.description: Formal specification for the MPC-enhanced Linear Secret Sharing protocol in Lux, enabling dynamic threshold cryptography with advanced resharing capabilities
lps.author: Lux Industries Inc., Vishnu (@vishnu)

lps.title: FROST - Flexible Round-Optimized Schnorr Threshold Signatures for EdDSA
lps.description: Formal specification for the FROST protocol implementation in Lux, providing efficient threshold Schnorr/EdDSA signatures with Taproot support
lps.author: Lux Industries Inc.

lps.title: Lamport One-Time Signatures (OTS) for Lux Safe
lps.description: Quantum-resistant signature extension for Lux Safe (Gnosis Safe fork) using Lamport OTS
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: LLM Gateway Integration with Hanzo AI
lps.author: Lux Team, Hanzo Team

lps.title: LRC-721 Non-Fungible Token Standard
lps.description: This special-numbered LP corresponds to the NFT standard on Lux, equivalent to Ethereum’s ERC-721.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)

lps.title: LRC-1155 Multi-Token Standard
lps.description: Another special number, corresponding to Ethereum’s ERC-1155 multi-token standard.
lps.author: Lux Network Team (@luxdefi)
